Classes in com.compendium.ui.dialogs used by com.compendium.ui
UIAboutDialog
          The UIAboutDialog displays the dialog with the application version number and credits, and links to relevant websites.
UIAerialDialog
          This class holds the Aerial Map view.
UIExportDialog
          UIExportDialog defines the export dialog, that allows the user to export PC Map/List Views to a MS-Word format document
UIExportViewDialog
          This class processes a view into HTML, and uses image maps for map views.
UIExportXMLDialog
          UIExportXMLDialog defines the export dialog, that allows the user to export PC Map/List Views to an XML document
UIImportDialog
          UIImportDialog defines the import dialog, that allows the user to import a Questmap export file into a Compendium view.
UIImportXMLDialog
          UIImportXMLDialog defines the import dialog, that allows the user to import an XML file into a Project Compendium view.
UILogonDialog
          Logon Dialog This dialog validates the logging user and allows logging onto the desired project provided the information provided is correct.
UINodeContentDialog
          This dialog displays a tabbedpane holding various panels with Node information.
UIProgressDialog
          Dialog used to display a progress bar.

          This is the small daiog shown while Compendium is starting up and preparing to open.
